title: ALL Khan Academy Math Exercses
subject: Math
description: Our compilation of the entire K-8 Khan Academy math curriculum… all in one place! This is especially great if you need targeted practice questions.

title: 826 Digital Library
subject: English
description: 826 has a plethora of ELA lessons, projects, videos, and other educator tools with a huge variety of relevant topics and needed skills
type: Activities, Lesson Plans, Videos, Worksheet/practice questions

title: Hand2Mind
subject: Art, English, Math, Science, Social Studies
description: Over 1,000 downloadable worksheets and lesson plans. Perfect for targeted practice, or for when you and your student are working on a personalized plan for any subject!

title: K5 Learning
subject: English, Math, Science
description: HUGE collection of K-5 topics and worksheets. Best for students learning to read or those needing more help with grammar and simple math

title: Basic Math Skill Teaching Videos
subject: Math
description:
Short(under 60 sec) math videos demonstrating basic math skills by solving elementary school math problems.
Focus on demonstrating the solution algorithm and highlighting key points to remember.

title: Free Short Stories
subject: English
description: Each children's story, fiction or non-fiction passage or poem is followed by several comprehension questions.

title: Mr. Nuss Baum Games
subject: Art, English, Math, Science, Social Studies
description: 400 original, interactive games that pinpoint specific skills in math, phonics, spelling, language arts, math, history, geography, social studies, and science for all grades

title: Supplemental Writing Lessons
subject: English
description: The lessons below will help your student strengthen their writing skills, which are critical as they move through late elementary and middle school.

title: Reading Comprehension Worksheets
subject: English
description: Over 100 free children's stories followed by comprehension exercises, as well as worksheets focused on specific comprehension topics (main idea, sequencing, etc).

title: Free Story Books
subject: English
description: Thousands of free online books to practice reading comprehension with your student

title: Virtual Labs (PHET) (K-5)
subject: Math, Science
description: Fun simulations regarding simple fractions, math, and basic sciences

title: Virtual Labs (PHET) (6-8)
subject: Science
description: Basic physics, chemistry simulations

title: K-3 Science Worksheet
subject: Science
description: Cover kindergarten through grade 3 science topics in the life sciences, earth sciences and physical sciences.

title: Interactive STEM Labs
subject: Science
description: FREE interactive STEM activities that aligns with NGSS- these modules are step by step and focus on data analysis. Environmental science, chemistry, and physics

title: K-5 Math Worksheets
subject: Math
description: Collection of downloadable math worksheets covering the ENTIRE elementary school math curriculum.

title: Consonants
subject: English
description: Learning to read: Beginning and ending consonants and consonant blends.

title: Vowel Worksheets
subject: English
description: Learning to read: Vowels and the sounds they make

title: Phonemes
subject: English
description: Learning to read: Write letters and words by "sounding out" simple words.

title: Help with reading/phonetics
subject: English
description: Especially useful for students learning how to read. Hundreds of sight words, practice words, and grammar worksheets!

title: K-5 Sight Words
